Text: Happy New YearNew Year I hope you and your family are all happy and well and I just wanted to send a little hello from snowy Boston I finished my first semester at Harvard Business School relatively unscathed Its really strange to be a student again I am enjoying it and am learning a ridiculous amount and there is just way too much information to actually ingest Its good fun but some of the people are really arrogant The people are not as nice as I thought they would be Theyre all very interesting but a lot of them are just investment bankers who want to back into investment banking The profs here are fantastic however and its been a very interesting semester I would love to hear about how youre doing about Enron North America etc What ever happened to the S Texas wind deal You know I am going to keep asking you about it I hope that the turbines have ALREADY been built and youre making tons of money off of them All the best and Happy New Year Claire
